summary.description:
a comparative genomics database of the phylum Chlamydiae and other members of the Planctomycetes-Verrucomicrobiae-Chlamydiae superphylum.

ChlamDB documentation â€” ChlamDB 2.0 (June 2019) documentation.

A comparative genomics database of the phylum Chlamydiae and other PVC (Planctomycetes, Verrucomicrobia, Lentisphaerae).

Problems and errors encountered on the ChlamDB website can be announced on the github page of the website
summary.name: ChlamDB
